text: Stunning single-story in Hidden Hills! Luxury designer touches at every turn with a modern open floorplan full of natural light with bifold doors creating an indoor/outdoor flow. Gorgeous new pool and spa with natural limestone and a rain curtain water feature are perfect for entertaining and outdoor living. The spacious gourmet kitchen features white oak cabinets with gorgeous Calacatta Marble countertops, both Wolf & Sub-zero appliances, a 72-bottle wine cellar, an icemaker, and retractable bi-fold kitchen window opening to the outdoor serving bar. The great room, dining room, kitchen, game room and all bedrooms all feature ultra-wide white oak floors with a see-through limestone fireplace to the contemporary open dining room. There are five bedrooms (including two primary suites), all with stone baths. The primary suite is brand new as a part of the expansion to create a massive spa-like bathroom and walk-in closets. Additional features include all new windows & doors, all new electrical, new HVAC systems with smart-home climate controls, new plumbing, new natural gas fireplaces, new appliances, Control 4 smart-home system for audio/video and Wi-Fi, tankless water heater system, new paver driveway, new hardscape, new landscape and irrigation, and a new metal standing seam roof. The beautiful grounds include a resort style pool with natural limestone coping, LED underlit steps, and a large Baja shelf. The adjoining barbecue center features a 42 Wolf BBQ grill with Wolf accessories, a beverage fridge, and a polished concrete dining island. From start to finish, this is a one of a kind, designer luxury home.

A modern transitional-style farmhouse provides endless hours of enchantment. Situated within the prestigious gated equestrian community of Hidden Hills, this exquisitely remodeled home epitomizes tranquility and luxury living. As you step into the grand foyer, high vaulted beamed ceilings welcome you. The main living area boasts exquisite large plank European white oak flooring, while custom LED lighting illuminates the space with a modern flair. The heart of the home, the gourmet kitchen, now features top-of-the-line appliances including True refrigerator and freezer and La Cornue range. The kitchen also boasts all custom cabinetry, custom pantry, oversized island with imported natural quartzite countertops throughout. A fabulous wet bar, complete with a fridge and ice machine, custom brass and glass shelving, adds a touch of sophistication, perfect for entertaining. Above the great room, sits a library with a custom bookshelf, stylish wainscoting, and an enclosed wine room with custom accent wall collage with wine boxes, making it a true piece of art. Upstairs, the primary en-suite is a sanctuary unto itself, featuring a lavish spa-like bathroom with a walk-in shower, freestanding tub, and custom LED-lit walk-in closet. Step outside onto the expansive wrap-around porch, where a private Jacuzzi awaits, offering serene views of the lush surroundings. Below, a cascading waterfall spills into a resort-style pool, surrounded by a meticulously landscaped rose garden, lined with tons of evergreen trees, a fruit tree garden, and two dramatic mature oak trees. The property exudes a sense of privacy and serenity. This home features a smart home system which integrates Sonos sound system, Emtek door lock, security cameras, video intercom, video doorbell, and Nest thermostat, that enables you to control your entire smart home from anywhere in the world from your device. Welcome to a truly special oasis within the acclaimed Las Virgenes School District, where every corner reflects the epitome of modern elegance, style, and comfort.

Welcome to this iconic Hidden Hills ranch-style retreat, where rustic charm seamlessly merges with nature on a sprawling 1.5-acre lot. As you approach, a lush front yard, adorned with towering trees and vibrant greenery, greets you, framed by a charming white fence that perfectly complements the home's warm, inviting facade. A stone walkway guides you to the elegant brown wooden front door, flanked by large windows that flood the interior with natural light. The rear of the home is equally captivating, featuring a sprawling brick patio that overlooks a beautifully landscaped hillside. This expansive outdoor space is perfect for entertaining, with large windows connecting you to the indoor living areas. A winding brick pathway leads to the upper portion of the property, where you'll discover an equestrian area complete with stalls, a barn, and paddocks. This fully fenced space is ideal for horse enthusiasts and offers easy access to surrounding trails. Inside, the home boasts a harmonious blend of traditional and contemporary design elements. The entryway, adorned with decorative tiles, opens into a spacious living room characterized by high vaulted ceilings, exposed dark wooden beams, and a skylight that bathes the space in sunlight. The adjacent dining area, elevated by a few steps, shares this sense of openness, making it ideal for hosting gatherings. The kitchen is a chef's delight, featuring a large island with cooktop burners, ample countertop space, and abundant cabinet storage. Warm red tiles on the floor and countertops add a cozy touch, while modern built-in appliances provide convenience. The primary bedroom is a tranquil retreat with vaulted ceilings and ample windows that offer stunning views of the surrounding landscape. The en-suite bathroom is both stylish and functional, featuring a large walk-in shower, dual sinks, and a jetted tub. There are two bedrooms plus an office that could be converted to a third bedroom. This home offers not just a place to live, but a lifestyle. Located in the heart of Hidden Hills, you'll enjoy unparalleled privacy, breathtaking 360-degree mountain views, and close proximity to hiking trails and the vibrant Hidden Hills and Calabasas communities. Whether seeking a peaceful escape or an entertainer's paradise, 5535 Jed Smith Rd has it all.

Located behind the gates of the prestigious Hidden Hills community, this expansive 3-acre parcel of land is a blank canvas for a future luxury dream estate. Situated on a quiet cul-de-sac on Walker Road with stunning panoramic city and mountain views, this private lot is a rare opportunity to own a piece of untouched land in Hidden Hills. Preliminary architectural plans for a 10, 000 -12, 000 sqft home, survey, and soil reports are available upon request. Seller will consider carrying a new first loan for a qualified buyer. Terms are negotiable.

Price improvement! Spectacular views highlight this stunning, model sharp one-story estate. Recently finished and completely reimagined from top to bottom, highlights include a brand new chef's kitchen with Wolf and Sub-Zero appliances, opening to the spacious family room with sliding walls of glass, living room with an architectural open beam ceiling, large game room, loft office, and a gorgeous bar/lounge showcasing the panoramic views. There are four bedroom suites in the main house, each with French doors to the garden and all with brand new baths, including the beautiful primary suite with dual baths (one with a soaking tub and one with a steam shower), plus dual custom closets, and a private patio with a spa tub nestled amongst the trees. There is also a beautiful guest house with a new kitchen & bath, and a separate gym with full bath, custom sauna, steam shower, and a Tonal workout system. The drought tolerant, lushly landscaped and very private grounds include a sparkling spa & pool with Badu swim jets, a large covered patio with fireplace, barbecue pavilion with T.V. center, patio dining area & counter seating, limestone fountains, additional seating area with firepit, play yard with swing set, in-ground trampoline and putting green, new synthetic turf, and a mature fruit orchard with citrus & avocado trees. Additional amenities include all new Dutch, White Oak flooring and White Oak cabinets, all new window coverings, a Control 4 Home Automation system, a Martin Logan home theater system with built-in speakers for the family room, three Clear Ice icemakers (kitchen, bar, BBQ cabana), a whole house Halo water purification system, indoor & outdoor sound system, security system complete with 16 cameras, all new T.V.'s, plus a back-up generator, new roof, a large chicken coop and approval for a future barn. The total square footage shown includes the main house, the guest house, and the detached gym.

Nestled up a private drive in the highly coveted, equestrian, guard gated community of Hidden Hills on an elevated 1 acre lot. This charming and rare single story California Ranch was meticulously reimagined in a complete high-end designer driven remodel in 2022. The home's open floor plan is filled with natural light and features 3 en-suite bedrooms, 5 bathrooms with a large office which can be converted to a 4th bedroom. The property includes all new systems, new French oak floors, vaulted high beam ceilings, custom wood windows and doors and an architectural limestone fireplace surround in the family room. The gourmet chef's kitchen which opens to the dining and family room features a large island, Wolf & Subzero appliances, quartz countertops, walk-in natural light pantry, counter-to-ceiling painted wood windows, 2 full size sinks and custom inset cabinetry with fumed oak and ivory finishes. The expansive dining room can host even the largest gathering boasting a serving wall featuring Zellij tile and glass & oak cabinetry. A charming brick entry, complimentary modern cottage laundry and elegant powder room with a floating integrated sink in Calcutta Viola marble are spaces that underscore up-to-the minute sought after design. The entry courtyard features a brand new pool and spa adorned with lush landscaping of lavender and olives. The yard is complete with an outdoor sitting area, BBQ, barrel sauna and multiple walking pathways around the home, ideal for entertaining and hosting family and friends. Additional features include control 4, surround sound, life source water filter, vegetable garden beds, fruit orchard, and a spacious bonus room adjacent to the garage. This home is designed to perfection with great attention to detail. Bring your suitcases and enjoy the Hidden Hills lifestyle.

Welcome to Chateau de Montagne, an exquisite French Country estate nestled in the prestigious gated celebrity enclave of Hidden Hills. The beautiful exterior, lush landscaping, large motor court and grand entryway will instantly transport you to the French countryside. This custom-built residence boasts breathtaking views of the mountains and city, offering a picturesque backdrop from multiple vantage points throughout the property. The impeccable craftsmanship is immediately evident as you enter the great room, adorned with beamed ceilings, an elegant fireplace and spacious living/dining area, perfect for hosting unforgettable gatherings and soirees. Step into the recently renovated chef's kitchen, a culinary paradise that seamlessly combines function and style with top-of-the-line appliances and luxurious finishes. The adjacent circular breakfast room offers sweeping views of the Valley for you to enjoy with your morning coffee. A large family room off the kitchen with built-in bookcases offers the perfect place to relax and unwind. For those seeking entertainment and leisure, indulge in the state-of-the-art movie theater, where you can enjoy your favorite films in the comfort of your own home. The downstairs also includes an ensuite guest room with private entry, as well as two bedrooms that could make an ideal office or gym. Retreat upstairs to the enormous primary suite, a sanctuary of luxury and tranquility with a private balcony featuring expansive views. This lavish retreat features his and hers closets, dual vanities, freestanding tub and luxurious shower that invites you to unwind and soak in pure bliss. There are two additional ensuite bedrooms upstairs. Outside in the entertainer's backyard a private oasis awaits. Unwind and rejuvenate in the spa, marvel at the tranquil fountain, or take a refreshing dip in the sparkling pool on warm summer days. The sprawling grounds, spanning over an acre, showcase meticulously manicured gardens and lush lawns, providing a serene ambiance for relaxation. Another highlight of this residence is the spacious 4-car garage that ensures ample parking and storage. Experience the Hidden Hills lifestyle, renowned for its exclusivity and privacy in this luxurious compound.

This equestrian estate is located in guard gated Hidden Hills, a prestigious equestrian community with many horse trails and 3 community horse arenas. The estate sits on a flat acre and features 4 bedrooms and 4.5 bathrooms. Separate guest house. The grand entry way leads into an open spacious floor plan. The gourmet chef's kitchen features a large center island and a breakfast nook, Wolf range/dual stove with 6 burners and a griddle, Wolf microwave, subzero refrigerator, Asco dishwasher, and recessed led lighting Both the family room and dining room are open and spacious plus a billiard room and theater room. There is an outdoor covered patio with a pool and spa which is ideal for entertaining There are 2 primary suites one is downstairs and one is upstairs both with large walk-in closets and bathrooms Both have fireplaces This is truly a horse lover's dream home with a spacious riding arena and a magnificent 5 stall barn featuring comfort stalls with paddocks, tack room and bathroom and easy access to community horse trails and the Saddle Creek riding arena.
Listing input for records only.

Welcome to 5360 Round Meadow, a property offering endless possibilities nestled within the prestigious Hidden Hills gated community. This original 4 bed, 3 bath single-story ranch is set on an expansive lot spanning over one acre, thoughtfully sited on an elevated pad that ensures privacy while providing scenic views of the surrounding area. Accentuating its rural charm is a swimmers pool, rustic barn and a sizable front yard. The generous lot size is teeming with potential, offering a blank canvas to developers seeking to craft a luxurious estate or to an owner wanting to transform it into a personal haven. Hidden Hills offers a unique blend of suburban tranquility and California charm. Recognized as one of Southern California's most coveted gated communities offering 35 miles of winding horse trails. community theatre and weekly Farmers Market. Beyond its immediate surroundings, Hidden Hills is conveniently located to The Commons of Calabasas, minutes from the Topanga Westfield Mall and The Village offering choice dining eateries, high end shopping and entertainment options. Further outdoor adventure awaits on the trails of Ahmanson Ranch, a haven for those who love hiking and exploring the region's natural beauty. Embrace the California lifestyle, where opportunity, nature, and convenience are perfectly aligned in one of Southern California's most desirable communities.

Welcome to 5808 Hilltop Road, nestled within the prestigious guard-gated community of Hidden Hills! Tucked away on a tranquil cul-de-sac, this charming single-story ranch home boasts 4 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms, making it a rare find in this coveted neighborhood. With the distinction of being the lowest priced home in Hidden Hills, there's incredible potential waiting to be unlocked! Head inside and immediately feel at home in this inviting traditional residence. Featuring hardwood floors throughout, the home offers a seamless blend of classic elegance and modern upgrades. The upgraded kitchen and bathrooms, along with the cozy fireplace and wine refrigerator, enhance the comfort and convenience of daily living. Entertain effortlessly in the spacious sunroom and game room, or step outside to enjoy the refreshing pool and serene surroundings. The garage space has been thoughtfully converted into a versatile game room, providing additional living space or the option for a fifth bedroom. For equestrian enthusiasts, the property also includes a three-stall barn, perfect for housing horses or other farm animals. With its central location in Hidden Hills, this property offers easy access to top-rated schools, scenic parks, upscale shopping destinations, and gourmet dining establishments. Don't miss the opportunity to make this exceptional Hidden Hills residence your own!

Sited behind private gates, this beautiful, and fully furnished custom estate totals approximately 12, 231 square feet of true luxury living. Step through the entry door into a world of quality and elegance. Every inch of this model sharp home shines. Highlights of the main house include a large downstairs primary suite with a retreat, dual baths, and dual custom closets, plus there are five additional en suite bedrooms, a gorgeous center island chef's kitchen, both a big breakfast room and a formal dining room, a spacious family room & game room, an entertainer's lounge with wet bar, refrigerated walk-in wine cellar, custom office, bonus room, and a sunny living room that opens to a covered dining patio that includes an outdoor theater area with cozy fireplace, all overlooking the spacious grounds. Additional property amenities include a beautiful detached gym with bath, steam shower and it's own adjoining spa, a large private guest house complete with a full kitchen, fireplace, and an additional bedroom and bath, two covered patios, a sparkling pool & spa with multiple waterfalls, expansive lawn areas, lush privacy landscaping, and a seven-car garage complete with four additional lifts for a total of 11 spaces. The home has also has a comprehensive new home automation system, gated driveways, and lush privacy landscaping, all on a expansive flat lot. If you've been waiting for something special, this is a truly beautiful home from start to finish. (The measured square footage includes the main house, guest house, and the detached gym house).

This beautiful private compound is simply like no other. Nestled on 2.5 flat acres, highlights include a 11, 639 square foot main house, a two bedroom 1, 092 square foot guest house, and a stellar 7, 200 square foot spa/sports/gym/entertainment pavilion, plus a large barn with adjoining stables for 7 horses, and garages for 6 cars. Amenities of the immaculate and model sharp main house include a true chef's kitchen with commercial grade range, convection ovens, pastry station, huge walk-through pantry, coffee station and sunny breakfast room, all opening to the large family room. There are also two offices, a big game room with 350 bottle refrigerated wine storage, a billiard room, a 13 seat home theater, a library/study, formal living & dining rooms, a mud room, play room, and a gift wrap room. There are five bedroom suites in the main house (4 upstairs) including the luxurious primary suite complete with a recessed sitting area, two large walk-in closets, spacious bathroom with dual vanities, jetted tub, oversized steam shower, and tranquil patio overlooking the private grounds. The secondary bedrooms are also spacious, with walk-in closets and study alcoves, while the guest house features an additional two bedrooms and two baths. The spectacular grounds of this lushly landscaped estate include meandering pathways that lead past the beach entry pool with waterfall & spa to the regulation tennis court. Underneath the tennis court is the simply amazing spa/sports/and entertainment area that includes a wellness center, huge gym, dance studio, racquetball court, batting cage, and 150 person nightclub with a huge bar and a separate entrance. The grounds also include a pool house, outdoor kitchen with barbecue & pizza oven, pool cabana with dining area with heating & TV, plus putting green, Koi pond and a fire pit. Also, there is a huge circular driveway and two other private accesses to the garages that can accommodate up to 20 more cars on the property. This is truly a one-of-a-kind estate.

This charming Mediterranean style home is sited on a beautiful, private, and all usable 1.37 acre lot. The spacious floor plan includes 4 downstairs suites, with the generous upstairs primary suite featuring a fireplace, hardwood floors, and a walk-out viewing balcony overlooking the rear grounds. Additional amenities include a chef's kitchen with freestanding range, all stainless steel appliances and sunny breakfast area that opens to the family room, plus a front facing office, and formal living & dining rooms. The superb and very private rear grounds include a large covered barbecue pavilion with outdoor dining area and fireplace, loads of flat grass lawn, a sparkling pool with automatic safety cover, and a nice upper pad for a future barn and horses with it's own turn-out area. The home also features mature trees, a circular driveway, and garages for three cars, all located within easy walking distance to the community tennis courts, community park, a riding arena, and much more. Just minutes to the prized, Las Virgenes Schools and The Commons Shopping Center, this home has much to offer.

Nestled in the highly coveted, equestrian, guard gated community of Hidden Hills discover this newly renovated, unique blend of timeless farmhouse fused with the seamless sophistication and elegance of contemporary design. An open floor plan features 5 spacious en-suite bedrooms, 6 bath, 5100 sq ft on over an acre lot. Tastefully designed and flooded with natural light in every room, highlighted by excellent quality finishes throughout. The heart of the home features a Chef's kitchen with large center island, breakfast room, walk-in pantry, custom bar, opens to a large family room with fireplace, formal dining room as well as spacious living room. Upstairs features a private primary suite-style bedroom and bath with soaking tub, dual walk-in closets, complete with living room size balcony overlooking the lushly landscaped, private yard. The expansive backyard is equipped with outdoor kitchen, bbq, pool, large sitting area and outdoor dining space as well as a large flat grassy second tier yard, ideal for enjoying the outdoors, entertaining friends, family and hosting outdoor sports activities. A single stall barn with additional room and horse corral completes this move in ready, quintessential hidden hills gem.

Sweeping pastoral views highlight this beautifully built and very private estate featuring a 10-car garage, and nestled on a lushly landscaped 1.89 acre lot. Sited on a newer cul-de-sac of all custom homes, in an excellent, central Hidden Hills location, you'll step through the entry doors into a world of quality and luxury living. Highlights of the sunny open floor plan include a gorgeous chef's kitchen with two islands & adjoining great room, a spacious formal dining room with refrigerated wine cellar & butler's pantry, entertainer's lounge with wet bar, custom home theater, large custom office, gym/spa with full bath & steam shower, big game room, and a bonus/playroom. The spacious primary suite offers sweeping pastoral views & includes a fireplace, walk-out balcony, luxurious bath with dual showers & two big custom closets (one fronted by a locking steel door), plus there are 5 additional en suite bedrooms. Additional amenities include a whole home, reverse osmosis water system and a whole home, gas powered back-up generator, plus a Savant smart home system, I-Pad controller for lights, music, theater, HVAC & pool, a WIFI & speaker system, Nest thermostats, touch pad security, cameras with recording system, tankless water heaters, a full safe room, a commercial elevator and a slate roof. The amazing and very private grounds feature a covered barbecue pavilion, zero edge pool/spa with Laminar water feature and LED lighting. With an excellent, central Hidden Hills location, and close to the highly ranked neighborhood schools & shopping, this beautiful custom estate has much to offer.

Set on an acre and a half at the end of a private cul-de-sac in the guard-gated community, this estate offers the ultimate in privacy and security. The home's unique architecture, designed by Nobel LA, offers the best in indoor/outdoor living. The interior features double-vaulted wood ceilings, glass walls, and opulent details, such as the bespoke brass fireplace and dual Preciosa chandeliers. Poolside cabana with indoor sitting area/game room, bathroom, built-in BBQ, fire pit, and video wall. Additional amenities include a home theater and fitness/music studio. Nestled within the tranquil Hidden Hills, this exquisite modern farmhouse retreat is not just a home; it's a testament to luxury living at its finest.

Welcome to the unique property located in the guard-gated community of Hidden Hills, offering an unobstructed view of the city lights and sited on a 1.25 acre lot with the potential for development and up-gradation. The house is a modern take on a traditional style, with six bedrooms and updated bathrooms and kitchen. The outdoor area features a large grassy lawn, pool and spa, all with stunning city views. The property is situated adjacent to the Ashley Ridge enclave and is accessed via a private driveway. This home offers a unique blend of privacy, luxury and potential for customization in one of Los Angeles's most exclusive neighborhoods.

Stalla Dolce, a modern estate in the coveted enclave of Hidden Hills, redefines luxurious California living. Spanning approximately 9, 000 square feet on 1.22 acres, the home offers a striking blend of timeless elegance and contemporary design. Enter through a massive glass pivot door into an expansive interior featuring soaring 15-foot ceilings and over 40 feet of pocket glass doors that invite the outdoors in. The open-concept chefs kitchen is a culinary haven, complete with a massive center island, professional-grade appliances, and a hidden second chef's kitchen. A stunning waterfall pool, adjacent spa, and inviting outdoor spaces create an ideal setting for both relaxation and entertaining. The versatile party barn is an entertainers dream, equipped with a high-end wet bar, guest suite, and entertainment systems. Thoughtfully designed with environmental considerations, this estate includes SMART HVAC, a sustainable garden with 16 fruit-producing trees a drought-tolerant landscape with a water reclaiming system, and an integrated music system, ensuring that every detail enhances comfort and style. Enhanced for peace of mind, the property features perimeter security, a guard and gate, and a pre-fire alert system, along with advanced security measures for both the home and grounds.

This beautifully upgraded, traditional-style estate spans approximately 9, 376 square feet of luxury living and is nestled on over an acre of flat land. Nicely remodeled throughout, highlights include a superb chef's kitchen featuring two large islands, quality, stainless steel appliances, and big, sunny breakfast room. all adjoining the spacious family room with fireplace & French doors that open to a large covered patio. There are also formal living & dining rooms, each with a coffered ceiling and fireplace, a butler's pantry, refrigerated wine cellar, beautiful custom home theater with newer audio-visual equipment, a front facing office, gym & mirrored yoga room, and an additional big upstairs den. There are six bedroom suites, most with newer baths, including a rare, downstairs primary suite with glass encased shower, soaking tub, dual closets and spacious retreat. The truly wonderful grounds are highlighted by a sparkling pool & spa with waterfalls, a fenced and full size sports court (great for basketball or pickleball), pool cabana with bath, plus loads of flat lawn area, mature fruit & shade trees, lush privacy landscaping, and a circular driveway. Don't miss this one!

Nestled at the end of a quiet cul de sac, this beautiful craftsman style estate was completed in 2016. Spanning nearly 9, 000 square feet of gracious living space (plus garages for 10 cars), this model sharp home is light & bright, and features an open floor plan. Highlights include a chef's, center island kitchen with quartz countertops, Wolf appliances & glass encased, refrigerated wine display, all opening to the spacious family room with cozy fireplace, wet bar, and retractable glass doors that seamlessly merge indoor and outdoor living. There are five en suite bedrooms including the luxurious primary suite with stone bath, dual walk-in closets, and a large sitting balcony with views of the natural surroundings and rolling hills beyond. Additional amenities include a home theater with adjacent, climate controlled wine cellar, home gym with steam shower, private elevator, and a Nest Smart Home System. The lushly landscaped and very private grounds include a sparkling pool with multiple waterfalls, spa with fountains, sitting area with fire bowls, full barbecue center, spacious patios and a large upper pad ideal for building a future barn, or perhaps a guest house. Don't miss this home that is model sharp from start to finish.

Sited near the end of a gentle cul-de-sac, this nicely updated one story home is nestled on a nearly one acre flat lot. Features of the sunny and open floor plan include a remodeled center island kitchen with stainless steel appliances & adjoining breakfast area, family room with fireplace & open beam ceiling, nicely casual living and dining rooms, spacious primary suite with newer bath, complete with soaking tub & walk-in closet, and four secondary bedrooms. Nestled on a quiet cul de sac, this immaculate home has been beautifully upgraded throughout and offers a sunny, open floor plan that's filled with natural light. Blending modern comfort and timeless charm, highlights include a chef's, center island kitchen with stainless steel appliances & adjoining breakfast room with bench seating, all opening to the spacious great room with wood floors, stone fireplace and big picture windows overlooking the rear grounds. Inspiring Montecito-Inspired Estate in Hidden Hills Oasis. Discover the allure of this captivating estate nestled on nearly two acres of exquisite landscape, offering a harmonious blend of Southern California living, privacy, and refined sophistication. Immersed within the exclusive guard-gated enclave of Hidden Hills, this luxurious residence captures the essence of Montecito haciendas, presenting an unmatched lifestyle of refined comfort. Step into a world of tranquility and exclusivity, where privacy takes center stage amidst the esteemed surroundings. As you enter the elegant foyer, you'll be immediately enchanted by the timeless ambiance, crafted with meticulous attention to detail. Throughout the home, volume ceilings, wood-cased windows, signature tiles, and hardwood floors gracefully define the living spaces. The sunlit formal living room showcases a bespoke fireplace, a generous picture window with a built-in window seat, and a pitched wood beam ceiling. Ideal for grand entertaining, the formal dining room comfortably accommodates twelve guests and adjoins a butler's pantry. The expansive chef's kitchen boasts custom stained glass lighting, professional-grade appliances, a center island, and a walk-in pantry. Seamless flow to the great room, complete with a welcoming fireplace, an entertainer's wet bar, an eating nook, and a connection to the backyard, sets the stage for unforgettable moments with loved ones and indoor-outdoor entertaining. Retreat to the upstairs primary suite, a haven of comfort and elegance. The suite boasts two balconies, a fireplace, and a spacious bathroom with oversized stall shower, spa tub, double water closets and two large walk-in closets. On the main floor, three generously proportioned ensuite secondary bedrooms each offer a walk-in closet. Mature landscaping and majestic trees create a picturesque backdrop, ensuring utmost serenity and privacy. The exceptional grounds resemble a park-like oasis, adorned with lush greenery, meticulous landscaping and city light views. Outdoor amenities include a captivating pool with water feature, a spa, and a cascading waterfall. Enhancing the space is a grand covered veranda, complete with an outdoor kitchen, pool table, and bar. Light bright laundry room and maid's quarters with full bath. For automotive enthusiasts or those in need of ample storage, an impressive 4-car garage awaits. Community amenities abound, boasting a championship-sized pool, tennis courts, multiple riding arenas, miles of scenic riding trails, and a weekly Farmers Market. This property is served by the award-winning Las Virgenes School District and located within minutes of Bristol Farms, Old Town Calabasas and The Commons Shopping Center offering boutique shopping, movie theatre and fine restaurants.

Welcome to Hidden Hills! This single-story ranch is nestled on a cul-de-sac on over an acre of flat land on one of the best locations in the community. Its the perfect place to turn your dreams into realityyou can enjoy it now or build your forever home. You'll have access to all the amenities of this coveted guard gated neighborhood : the community center, pool, equestrian trails and arenas, tennis courts, theater, community events, classes and more! The current owner expanded and partially remodeled the home about 20 years ago and added a primary suite with high ceilings, an ensuite bath with dual sinks, separate shower and tub and a walk in closet. The open concept kitchen features a large island, built in banquette, Thermador double ovens, a GE 5 burner gas stove and natural stone counters. There are beautiful French doors throughout letting in rays of natural sunlight. The layout includes 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, large open kitchen open to family and living rooms and dining room, pool and extensive horse facilities including stalls for five horses, a dedicated tack room and large feed and hay storage. This sought after neighborhood has a rural feel with great public and private schools nearby. You'll love living in Hidden Hills because of its country way of life, pastoral views, and serene surroundings yet youre close to all Southern California has to offer!

This beautiful new contemporary farmhouse is sited among mature oak & olive trees and nestled on a large, over one-acre flat lot. Step through the custom iron & glass door into a world of elegance & luxury. The spacious open floor plan features huge picture windows and sliding walls of glass that flood the home with natural light. Highlights include a gorgeous chef's kitchen with large adjoining butlers pantry, formal dining room with refrigerated wine storage, wonderful entertainers game room with large serving bar, family room with stone fireplace, gorgeous home theater with upholstered walls, plus a custom office and an architectural floating staircase.
